name: Hot Topic
description:
Now working on 3G/3GS/iPad.

Want the perfect Party Game for you and your friends? If you enjoy games like Taboo, CatchPhrase, Password, or Outburst then you'll love Hot Topic.

The makers of Word Party have done it again- a multi-player, multi-team game for the iPhone, or iPod Touch (native iPad coming soon as a free update). Only 1 device is needed to play with all your friends.

"Put a party in your pocket with Hot Topic!"

---------------------------------------------------------------

Hot Topic is fun and easy to learn. Teams take turns guessing answers relating to a specific topic. If your guess appears in the on-screen list, you get a point. The team with the most points wins. For 2 or more players.

Hundreds of pre-loaded topics and answers included to get you started for hours of fun. Free future updates.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Play Hot Topic:
-In the car on long road trips
-With your family
-At your friend's house
-At a party
-At a bar
-At the airport
